title: Whoscall Wear - Android wear
summary: Use next-generation smart watch to find out who is calling you!
description: Who Wear now supports more smartwatch than ever!- Android Wear devices- webOS devices like LG watch Urbane LTEKnow who is calling you before you even answer it!Whoscall can even identify if the call is a telephone marketing or unwanted call! The best app for identifying calls now on your smart watch! ▷ Amazing features ◁   1. Identify unwanted calls  - Annoying telephone marketing calls or spam messages!     As soon as your phone rings, Whoscall can immediately let you know who the caller is     Now, it can even be used with your smartwatch.  2. Global coverage­  - Who Wear uses the same database as Whoscall   - Astonishing database over 700 million global phone numbers 3. Caller ID from Whoscall database as well as information shared between users  - Report phone numbers and create a reliable communication network for everyone ▷ Check list ◁Unlike previous versions, Who Wear functions independently without WhoscallWhoscall and Who Wear can co-exist* To install Whoscall :   http://bit.ly/1bXFl7d▷ System requirements ◁(1) Android v4.3 or above(2) Lastest Android Wear or Watch Manager (for LG watch Urbane LTE)(3) Stable internet connection(4) Smartwatch connected to your smartphone*** May encounter problems with some HTC mobile phones. *** For LG watch Urbane LTE, if you want to use whoscall together, please install latest version on your phone*** Optimized for the following devices:- Android Wear : LG G watch                            Samsung Gear Live- webOS : LG watch Urbane LTE
descriptionHTML:
Who Wear now supports more smartwatch than ever!
- Android Wear devices
- webOS devices like LG watch Urbane LTE

Know who is calling you before you even answer it!
Whoscall can even identify if the call is a telephone marketing or unwanted call!

The best app for identifying calls now on your smart watch!


▷ Amazing features ◁

1. Identify unwanted calls
- Annoying telephone marketing calls or spam messages!
As soon as your phone rings, Whoscall can immediately let you know who the caller is
Now, it can even be used with your smartwatch.

2. Global coverage
­ - Who Wear uses the same database as Whoscall
- Astonishing database over 700 million global phone numbers

3. Caller ID from Whoscall database as well as information shared between users
- Report phone numbers and create a reliable communication network for everyone


▷ Check list ◁
Unlike previous versions, Who Wear functions independently without Whoscall
Whoscall and Who Wear can co-exist

* To install Whoscall : http://bit.ly/1bXFl7d


▷ System requirements ◁
(1) Android v4.3 or above
(2) Lastest Android Wear or Watch Manager (for LG watch Urbane LTE)
(3) Stable internet connection
(4) Smartwatch connected to your smartphone


*** May encounter problems with some HTC mobile phones.
*** For LG watch Urbane LTE, if you want to use whoscall together, please install latest version on your phone
*** Optimized for the following devices:
- Android Wear : LG G watch
Samsung Gear Live
- webOS : LG watch Urbane LTE
comments: For me,  a true caller I.D. will not only show a phone number, but also show individual name and or name of business. I often see unknown, private, and blocked phone numbers. I also might add that I often see a phone number but no name associated with it. Additionally and lastly, this app I find my experience does not block text messages and UNWANTED SHORT CODES (often spam, solicitations, phishing, scams, etc.). If this can significantly improve, I will give this app a much higher or the highest rating.

Do not shows the contact photo When a contact call me the APP only show me the person name. In my telephone I have the same contact in differents social account (Google +, Facebook, LinkedIn). How I can integrate all the social network to Whoscall Wear show me the contact photo who is calling me?
Barely works Doesn't display names, it merely gives you the category if you wait more than 20 seconds while your phone is ringing. To slow, not useful information.
Sad Let down doesn't  show up on my  phone's pages after being  installed,nothing happens when I get a call
Annoying delay Keeps vibrating Moto 360.2 even after answered or cancelled on Galaxy Note 4 phone. Otherwise I like it.
Doesn't work on SD card right. When I moved the app to the SD card, it doesn't work right on Moto 360.
